ygData.subject: RE: Elf Hide Gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: True, but at the level you are fighting wisps for example a cap of 100 on a level based skill is moot; you can t get there anyway.  They just didnt want any
ygData.messageBody:
True, but at the level you are fighting wisps for example a cap of 100 on a
level based skill is moot; you can't get there anyway. They just didnt want
any melee type running around killing wisps with something they got off a
level 7 froglock, like woven gloves.

-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:slasher@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 07, 1999 3:39 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Elf Hide Gloves


From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>

>Or did Verant goof and give the melee classes the same
>H2H cap as monks, and this was their way of fixing it?

All melee classes cap at 100 H2H, except monks who go
up into the 200s. Which makes sense.

Harmonic Distortion, 38th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk

the subject lol.
